mapper.select: SELECT sps.*, ssi.STAND_SORT || ' ' || ssi.STAND_NUMBER || '-' || ssi.STAND_YEAR AS shownumber, ssi.country, ssi.STAND_NAME AS showname FROM SAR_PRODUCT_STAND sps INNER JOIN SAR_STANDARDS_INFO ssi ON ssi.id = sps.stand_id INNER JOIN SAR_STAND_VAL ON SAR_STAND_VAL.stand_id = ssi.id AND SAR_STAND_VAL.property_type = 'APPLY_AUTH' AND SAR_STAND_VAL.property_val = #{typeCode} WHERE sps.product_id = #{id} UNION SELECT spl.*, sli.LAWS_NUMBER AS shownumber, sli.country, sli.LAWS_NAME FROM SAR_PRODUCT_LAWS spl INNER JOIN SAR_laws_INFO sli ON sli.id = spl.laws_id INNER JOIN SAR_LAWS_VAL ON SAR_LAWS_VAL.laws_id = sli.id AND SAR_LAWS_VAL.property_type = 'APPLY_AUTH' AND SAR_LAWS_VAL.property_val = #{typeCode} WHERE spl.product_id = #{id} UNION SELECT sps.*, sbs.STAND_CODE AS shownumber, '中国' AS country, sbs.STAND_NAME FROM SAR_PRODUCT_STAND sps INNER JOIN SAR_BUSSIONESS_STAND sbs ON sbs.id = sps.stand_id INNER JOIN SAR_BUSS_STAND_VAL ON SAR_BUSS_STAND_VAL.stand_id = sbs.id AND SAR_BUSS_STAND_VAL.property_type = 'APPLY_AUTH' AND SAR_BUSS_STAND_VAL.property_value = #{typeCode} WHERE sps.product_id =#{id}
